title: Email Verification Not Received
description: Customer signed up but did not receive a verification email despite multiple attempts.

title: Promo Code Not Applying
description: Customer reports that the discount code 'WELCOME20' is not applying at checkout.

title: Cannot Change Password
description: Customer is unable to update their password via the settings page. Error: 'Invalid request'.

title: Unexpected Logout
description: Customer is being logged out automatically after a few minutes of inactivity.

title: App Not Syncing with Website
description: Customer's data on the app doesn't match what they see on the website dashboard.

title: Unable to Add New Payment Method
description: Customer is trying to add a new debit card but the system rejects it with no error message.

title: Language Settings Not Saving
description: Customer changes the language to Spanish, but the site reverts back to English.

title: Overdue Invoice Alert Issue
description: Customer keeps receiving alerts about an overdue invoice thatâ€™s already been paid.

title: Dark Mode Not Available
description: Customer is unable to find the option to enable dark mode in the latest update.

title: Push Notifications Not Working
description: Customer has enabled push notifications but is not receiving any alerts.

title: Incorrect Profile Name Display
description: Customer's profile is showing an old display name even after updating it.

title: Multiple Charges for One Order
description: Customer was charged twice for a single purchase and wants a refund.
